label: 宝相華
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 57th  . Nara National Museum . 2005
説明文: A Buddhist floral motif that was widely used in Tang-dynasty arabesque designs. Not depicting any actual blossom, this flower was created by Tang designers and was brought into Japan in the Nara period. It is widely used in Buddhist art in the Shōsō-in.　[正倉院]
